Contextual analysis: The expert may have examined the surrounding circumstances or events to assess the likelihood of President Trump coming into contact with a potential coronavirus sufferer. Source verification: The expert may have investigated the source of the claim to determine its credibility. Comparison with previous behavior: The expert may have compared the claim with President Trump's past actions or statements to assess its consistency.
